src

Class Drawing

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.BaseImage
      • src.Image
        • src.Drawing

  • public class Drawing
extends Image
    Image with abilities to draw shapes and text.
    Author:
    Cy

      • drawPolygon

        public void drawPolygon(int[] xPoints,
                        int[] yPoints)
        Draws a polygon with points from xPoints and yPoints. Will only use the number of points in the smallest list.
        Parameters:
        xPoints - array of x coordinates
        yPoints - array of y coordinates

      • fillPolygon

        public void fillPolygon(int[] xPoints,
                        int[] yPoints)
        Draws and fills a polygon with points from xPoints and yPoints. Will only use the number of points in the smallest list.
        Parameters:
        xPoints - array of x coordinates
        yPoints - array of y coordinates

      • drawArc

        public void drawArc(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    int startAngle,
                    int endAngle)
        Draws an elipse, but only draws from angle startAngle to endAngle.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of top left corner
        y - y coordinate of top left corner
        width - width of ellipse
        height - height of ellipse
        startAngle - angle in degrees to start drawing from
        endAngle - angle in degrees to stop drawing at

        arcHeight - angle in degrees to stop cutting at
